channel.title: [updated] autocasting
channel.description:
[s]Dear moparscapers,
Well i got some ideas to code in my server but i want to know if you guys like it or not.
Well first off all i'm thinking about to remove all the teleports and remplace them with the normal ones (maybe with runes) and make portals or other ways to get to minigames, monsters. Also, i want to make the teleporting leveling so u will get xp for teleporting to somewhere.
Adding quests: Well i'm busy with adding quests and maded a quest point system for quest cape what quests should i add and do u guys think it is a good idea.
Well thanks for reading this, your opinion is important for me.
NOTE: if this isn't allowed or in the wrong section please remove it or put in the right section.
halflive9[/s]
Dear moparscapers,
Is there somewhere autocasting released for a delta or someone that could help me with that because i couldn't find it on google :s

item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

yes, but idk where i should start to look… i know in client.java maybe attack() but then idk never worked with magic before :s
